query:
SELECT
            t.name as "tier_name!",
            t.color as "tier_color!",
            COUNT(ul.user_id) as "count!: i64"
        FROM tiers t
        LEFT JOIN user_loyalty ul ON t.id = ul.tier_id
        WHERE t.is_active = true
        GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.color, t.sort_order
        ORDER BY t.sort_order
